unnormalised: Okay, spill the chai! Let's dive into the latest Bollywood buzz, shall we? It's been a crazy week, folks, and the gossip mills are working overtime.
normalised: Okay, spill the chai! Let's dive into the latest Bollywood buzz, shall we? It's been a crazy week, folks, and the gossip mills are working overtime.

unnormalised: First up, rumours are swirling around about Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor expecting baby no. 2! No official announcement yet, but my sources (aunty next door who knows EVERYTHING) says she spotted Alia at a Manish Malhotra fitting looking suspiciously glowy. Remember how quickly the news broke about Raha? We might be seeing another little Kapoor soon!

No official announcement yet, but my sources (aunty next door who knows EVERYTHING) says she spotted Alia at a Manish Malhotra fitting looking suspiciously glowy. Remember how quickly the news broke about Raha? We might be seeing another little Kapoor soon!

unnormalised: Then there’s the drama unfolding between Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh. Are they really on the rocks? Some paps snapped Ranveer chilling at a cafe in Bandra solo, looking rather glum. No Deepika in sight. Others are saying it's just work commitments keeping them apart. Guess only time will tell. Someone needs to consult that famous Panditji from Juhu beach!
normalised: Then there’s the drama unfolding between Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh. Are they really on the rocks? Someone needs to consult that famous Panditji from Juhu beach!

unnormalised: Moving on to more lighthearted news, rumour has it that Janhvi Kapoor is dating her *Devara* co-star, Jr. NTR. I mean, the on-screen chemistry is electric, right? Apparently, they were spotted grabbing coffee together after a late-night shoot in Hyderabad, and onlookers said they looked super cozy. Talk about a South Indian romance! This reminds me of the classic Yash Chopra film *Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge*, but with a Tollywood twist!

unnormalised: And finally, can we talk about the MET Gala looks? Priyanka Chopra totally rocked that outfit, even if some Twitterati called it "avant-garde" (read: slightly confusing). Everyone's comparing it to her iconic looks from her time at Mayo College Girls School. The girl clearly knows how to make an entrance! Okay folks, that's all the gossip for now. Stay tuned for more juicy updates next week! Don’t forget to follow for the hottest takes! Bye bye!
